description: Like prawns could get any better? Well, they have in this garlic and paprika prawn recipe you'll wish you'd discovered years ago.
keywords: Garlic & Paprika Prawns With Warm Corn Salad
name: Garlic & Paprika Prawns With Warm Corn Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Top mash with remaining onion, then season with pepper. Arrange corn mixture on a platter and top with prawns. Serve with lemon wedges and mash.
